archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Close Request
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Formally closes the request when all related activities have been terminated Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory formally closes the request when all related activities have been terminated Optional Not used for this process element
